entry.title: Game: Nostalgia (DS, 2008)
entry.content:
Since the flood, I haven't been able to play my normal game regime. I decided to play a DS game, since that still works. I picked up Nostalgia.

This game is great. It is basically Indiana Jones the RPG. The alternate history world is really fun. The battle system is straight-forward and classic, but still fun. The skill system is interesting, although I didn't find it that necessary to actually use the skills much. Overall, I enjoyed it a lot.

The main problem is that after 12 hours, I had to stop because I hit a well-known glitch in the game that stops your progression. I read a few people on forums talking about the problem and having to return the game, etc. Very disappointing, but it was a fun experience while it lasted.
